XI.ii.3.A.1.a
.
Definition:  Accrued Benefits
Accrued benefits
are benefits due to the beneficiary but not paid prior to death.
Reference
:  For more information on entitlement to accrued benefits, see
38 U.S.C. 5121
, and
38 CFR 3.1000
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A  - Entitlement to Accrued Benefits Under 38 U.S.C. 5121
